bibl.title: The Fayyûm Desert as an Agricultural Landscape. Recent Research Results.
bibl.note: Landscape archaeology. - Excavation history and assessment of present situation at Karanis. - Research design and main questions. - Excavations in Karanis East. - El-Qarah el-Hamra and Qaret Rusas. - Preservation and presentation.

bibl.title: Das Fayyûm in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike.

bibl.seg: René Cappers, Emily Cole, Daniel Jones, Simon Holdaway & Willeke Wendrich, The Fayyûm Desert as an Agricultural Landscape. Recent Research Results.

Carolin Arlt & Martin Andreas Stadler (edd.), unter Mitarbeit von Ulrike Weinmann, Das Fayyûm in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike (Wiesbaden, 2013) pp. 35-50, 4 pll.

Landscape archaeology. - Excavation history and assessment of present situation at Karanis. - Research design and main questions. - Excavations in Karanis East. - El-Qarah el-Hamra and Qaret Rusas. - Preservation and presentation.
